values.value:
Dear {!Contact.Name},

Thank you for your support of The Council of State Governments, or CSG.

Please find enclosed invoice #{!Invoice__c.Invoice_Number__c} due {!Invoice__c.Due_Date__c} and CSG W-9. If you need any additional information to facilitate the processing of your payment, including assistance with EFT/ACH information or any changes to your invoice, please let me know.

We greatly appreciate your partnership and look forward to future collaborations.

Best,

{!User.Name}
